articles.title: Publix to offer coronavirus vaccine in all Florida stores - Yahoo News
articles.description: All of Publix’s 730 store pharmacies will have vaccination appointment slots available starting Friday.
articles.content:
Publix will begin offering appointments for the COVID-19 vaccine at all 730 of its in-store pharmacies, the Lakeland grocer announced Thursday.
